item.title: Intro to Rust - Hello World
item.description: Installing and configuring Rust is a breeze with rustup which is an installer for Rust. You can download it by visiting: https://rustup.rs/ And following the onscreen instructions. You can confirm that the installation has worked by running: rustc --version The rustup installation also comes with another command line tool called cargo which is the Rust packager manager – akin to npm for Node. Rust packages are called crates and there is an online repository of crates visible here:
